title: Sheep 8
warning_no_rom: No ROM selected. Emulation cannot start.
info_stopped: Emulation has been stopped. Please close the game window if necessary.
warning_no_rom_reset: No ROM selected. Cannot reset emulation.
settings_msg: No configurable option for now. Stay tuned for future updates :) !
help_msg:
Welcome to Sheep 8!

To start emulation, open a ROM using the File menu.
Use the Control menu to start or stop emulation.
For any other questions, see the documentation.
about_msg:
Sheep 8 - CHIP-8 Emulator

Developed by 2LazyCoffee2 and TortipOOF
Beta version 0.2.0
For more information, see the GitHub repository.
no_roms_in_folder: No .ch8 ROM found in the selected folder. Please check the selected folder or its contents.
